name: Tiny Tank Tussle
description:
In this 1v1 Local Multiplayer game, duke it out as miniature tanks whilst collecting ammo to be the victor! Enemies roam the field, so avoid those in order to retain your ammo count!

[Beware: May take a while to load. Sorry.]

[Developer's Log]

Update is now up!

-Additions-

• Redesigned Levels, bar the Mountains

• Power Plant is now Factory

• Removed Final Destination (Destiny)

• Added a new Stage Select screen

• Added a tutorial

• Fixed some errors involving Ammo Crates

~ Sivelos

--Controls--

Player 1:

A / D: Left and Right respectively

W: Jump

S: Shoot (If you have ammo)

Player 2:

Left Arrow / Right Arrow: Left and Right respectively

Up Arrow: Jump

Down Arrow: Shoot (If  you have ammo)

--Music Credits--

Kris Keyser

Rolemusic
